## callIfDefined variable

Calls a function if defined and provides compile time type checking for the passed in parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callIfDefined: <GFunc extends AnyFunction<any>>(fn: unknown, ...args: Parameters<GFunc>) => void
```
